guide.neovitae.landing_text: Welcome to $(6)Neo Vitae$()! $(br2)$(l:neovitae:utility/nyi)A lot of stuff$() isn't yet implemented, so please excuse our dust. $(br2)Click $(l:neovitae:utility/getting_started)HERE$() to get started. If you find any bugs, please report them on our $(l:https://github.com/breakinblocks/NeoVitae/issues)Github$().
